Compute the cross-validation for the ngme model

cross_validation.Rd

Compute the cross-validation for the ngme model

cross_validation(
  ngme,
  type = "k-fold",
  k = 5,
  N = 100,
  percent = 50,
  times = 10,
  group = NULL,
  print = FALSE,
  seed = Sys.time()
)

Arguments

ngme

a ngme object

type

character, cv type, in c("k-fold", "loo", "lpo") loo is leave-one-out, and lpo is leave-percent-out

k

integer, if using "k-fold" cv

N

integer, number of samplings (the higher, the better)

percent

from 1 to 100, if using leave percent off cv ("lpo")

times

run how many times (only for lpo type)

group

group of indices of test set Can be the result of last CV function, or a list of indices

print

print information along the process

seed

random seed

Value

a list of MSE, MAE, CRPS, sCRPS

Contents
